Welcome to OpAMP Commander: A Commander Learn More Go To Repo OpAMP Commander is a system to manage observability agents using OpAMP (Open Agent Management Protocol) defined by OpenTelemetry
OpAMP Commander is a system to manage observability agents using OpAMP (Open Agent Management Protocol). More details, Please see opampcommander
New chair metrics! The Goldydocs UI now shows chair size metrics by default.
Please follow this space for updates!
Contributions welcome! We do a Pull Request contributions workflow on GitHub. New users are always welcome!
